sentences.en: Disclosure: This reporter also lives in New Haven and has heard Chua regale friends with parenting stories.

sentences.cn: 别人老是给他讲些倒霉事儿来逗他开心。

sentences.en: She is at present gone for the best nectar and ambrosia to regale me this evening.
